name: Riso Scotti Organic Almond Drink
description: Riso Scotti  Almond Drink is very tasty and nutritious, without organic gluten. It contains no sugar or sweeteners, so you can enjoy the original taste of almonds. Almond drink is an excellent substitute for milk, since it does not contain lactose. Good for breakfast with muesli, with coffee or tea.*Images for illustration purposes only.Product received may vary.
